title: Pelawatta House for sale
details:
15 Perches, 3500sqft, 4 Bedrooms, 3 Attached Bathrooms.

Location – Pelawatta, 400 m from Boralla Bus route.

Ground floor :

Large Living, dining, Veranda, Pantry and One bedroom with attached Bathroom.

First floor :

Three bedrooms with two Attached Bathrooms.

Amenities :

§ hot water

§ A/C room

§ One vehicle parking space.

§ Ample parking inside.

§ Highly residential area.

§ overhead water tank.

§ fully tile flooring.

§ Colonial architectural design.

§ Large Garden area.
§ Exposed rafter wooden ceiling.
